title: Underbite: Rat Rumble Idle War
description: Underbite: Rat Rumble Idle War is an idle battler set in a secret rodent civilization hidden within an old attic, now torn apart by an endless war. Command the Wheel Allianceâ€™s front line and battle against the dark magic of the Order of the Rusty Trap, a ruthless faction bent on total domination.
